citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:45 am on
03-Oct-17.
Phone call was made to registrant and was not available to accompany on an inspection. Registrant stated they
plan on submitting a cancellation.

narrative:
